## countBy() function

Count instances of a value of an array by a callback function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function countBy<T1, T2>(array: T1[], callback: (value: T1) => T2): Map<T2, number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T1[]</code> |  |
|  callback | <code>(value: T1) =&gt; T2</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Map<T2, number>`
